name: Watch Them Spikes
description:
Watch Them Spikes is a 3D Skill-Avoid Game in which you only have indirect control over the player through rotating the platform it's on.

Gameplay: Use WASD to rotate the platform and roll over it to collect all the green gems. Watch out not to be touched by the Spikeballs on the platform. You can pause the game with the ESC/Tab keys.

Credits can be found in the Main Menu of the game.

Have fun playing! I'm happy to receive your feedback!
